B

BackgroundSystemMonitor - Class in software.leonov.system.monitor
A thread-safe SystemMonitor implementation that asynchronously refreshes usage metrics using a dedicated background daemon thread.

F

formatBinaryBytes(long) - Static method in class software.leonov.system.monitor.util.Formatter
Formats the given number of bytes into a human-readable string in the binary (1024) base unit.
formatDecimalBytes(long) - Static method in class software.leonov.system.monitor.util.Formatter
Formats the given number of bytes into a human-readable string in the decimal (1000) base unit.
formatPercent(double) - Static method in class software.leonov.system.monitor.util.Formatter
Formats the given percent value into a human-readable string.
Formatter - Class in software.leonov.system.monitor.util
Basic utility methods for formatting CPU and memory usage metrics.

G

getAvailableMemory() - Static method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.SystemMonitor
Returns the maximum amount of heap memory (in bytes) the JVM will attempt to use or -1 if the information is unavailable.
getAvailableProcessors() - Static method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.SystemMonitor
Returns the number of processors available to the JVM.
getAverageProcessCpuLoad() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.CpuUsage
Returns the average JVM process CPU usage or -1 if it is not supported or not ready.
getAverageSystemCpuLoad() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.CpuUsage
Returns average system-wide CPU usage or -1 if it is not supported or not ready.
getInstance() - Static method in class software.leonov.system.monitor.UnsupportedSystemMonitor
Returns a singleton instance of UnsupportedSystemMonitor.
getJVMName() - Static method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.SystemMonitor
Returns the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) name.
getJVMVendor() - Static method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.SystemMonitor
Returns the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) vendor.
getMaxProcessCpuLoad() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.CpuUsage
Returns the maximum observed JVM process CPU usage (0.0 to 100.0) or -1 if it is not supported or not ready.
getMaxSystemCpuLoad() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.CpuUsage
Returns the maximum observed system-wide CPU usage (0.0 to 100.0) or -1 if it is not supported or not ready.
getMaxUsedMemory() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.MemoryUsage
Returns the maximum observed amount of heap memory (in bytes) that has been used by the JVM or -1 if the information is unavailable.
getProcessCpuLoad() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.CpuUsage
Returns the JVM process CPU usage or -1 if it is not supported.
getSystemCpuLoad() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.CpuUsage
Returns the system-wide CPU usage or -1 if it is not supported.
getSystemLoadAverage() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.CpuUsage
Returns the system load average for the last minute (only supported on Unix/Linux systems) or -1 if it is not supported.
getTotalMemory() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.MemoryUsage
Returns the amount of heap memory (in bytes) that is currently committed for the JVM's use or -1 if the information is unavailable.
getUsedMemory() - Method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.MemoryUsage
Returns the amount of heap memory (in bytes) currently used by the JVM or -1 if the information is unavailable.

I

isSystemCpuUsageSupported() - Static method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.SystemMonitor
Returns whether or not CpuUsage.getSystemCpuLoad() and CpuUsage.getAverageSystemCpuLoad() are supported.

L

LazySystemMonitor - Class in software.leonov.system.monitor
A thread-safe SystemMonitor implementation that refreshes usage metrics on demand.

R

S

software.leonov.system.monitor - package software.leonov.system.monitor
Classes and interfaces for monitoring system-level resource usage.
software.leonov.system.monitor.util - package software.leonov.system.monitor.util
Miscellaneous convenience utilities.
start() - Method in class software.leonov.system.monitor.BackgroundSystemMonitor
Starts this monitor's background thread.
stop() - Method in class software.leonov.system.monitor.BackgroundSystemMonitor
Stops this monitor's background thread.
supportedJavaVersion() - Static method in interface software.leonov.system.monitor.SystemMonitor
Returns the Java version supported by the Java Virtual Machine (JVM).
SystemMonitor - Interface in software.leonov.system.monitor
Monitors Java Virtual Machine (JVM) and system-level resource usage such as CPU and memory.

U

UnsupportedSystemMonitor - Class in software.leonov.system.monitor
A SystemMonitor that does nothing.

W
